text: I invite you to see my participation today in an interview with Elsie Sierra at the Sunday cafeteria, starting at 7:00 p.m. on channel 3.
The announcement I'm about to make is for you, @EveryAustralian, and the thousands of Australians you represent. #NDISRally JG
RT @EveryAustralian: It's real! We did it!!! @JuliaGillard confirms funding in May Budget for a #NDIS @ Sydney #NDISRally. http://t.co/T ...
My Government will fund our share for the first stage of the #NDIS in next Tuesday’s Budget. JG
From the middle of next year the #NDIS will be launched at select sites around the country. By mid 2014 it will serve 20,000 Australians. JG
Today I announced tough new measures to deter illegal mass arrivals and people smuggling to NZ.
I arrive in the morning studio of # Europe1! # FH2012
It is necessary to address the electors, it is they who decide. I do not negotiate between the two towers. # Europe1
I must be humble about the ballot. # Europe1
Rarely has a debate changed the fate of a presidential election. # Europe1
May 1st is a time when it is the trade unions that decide, it is not the parties who set the agenda. # Europe1
Social spending increases will be limited to 3%. # Europe1
Dominique Strauss-Kahn is not in the countryside and does not have to come back. # Europe1
An election is always a choice and therefore division. The role of the elected President is to reconcile. # Europe1
In this campaign, I have not opposed two France. # Europe1
The left, if elected on Sunday, will be fully associated with the country's responsibility. # Europe1
I do not think borders are the main subject of the presidential election! # Europe1
Illegal immigration is not acceptable. We must fight effectively against clandestine chains. # Europe1
There is an awareness in Europe. The word "growth" is back. # Europe1
If I am elected, we can enter a renegotiation. #Europe # Europe1
I will finance the creation of posts in the National Education by eliminating the tax relief on wealth. # Europe1
If I want to be respected tomorrow, I must respect others. #Styndats # Europe1
My quality is tenacity. # Europe1
I want a mechanism for indexing the Smic on prices and some of the growth. # Europe1
I call for patriotism: to be French means to pay taxes! # Europe1
I made sure to be ready, if the French give me their confidence, from day one: http://t.co/zuUShNgL # Europe1
@moeen_elborkey Voter registration is the responsibility of the UNHCR and not the government. Our role is to support UNHCR to hold elections. We asked the embassies to list the Libyans

PM # Netanyahu's Father, Prof. Ben-Zion Netanyahu, passed away early this morning
PM #Netanyahu at his father's, Ben-Zion Netanyahu, funeral in Jerusalem. Photo: Avi Ohayun, GPO http://t.co/v7P1o1s9
PM #Netanyahu at his father's, Ben-Zion Netanyahu, funeral in Jerusalem. Photo: Avi Ohayun, GPO http://t.co/9wIwKM7m
Today we sign the bill of tax reform aimed at increasing the quality and access to Preschool, School and Higher Education
With this reform we will increase scholarships for Higher Education from 118 thousand in 2009, to more than 400 thousand in 2014.
It will also allow the increase of 75,000 places in pre-kindergarten and kindergarten, giving free coverage for all children of the most vulnerable 60%.
Also, the modification of the SIPCO, in the face of increases in oil, will give deserved relief to families in the price of fuel.
Later today I’ll be giving an important speech in Wellington.  I’ll talk about some of our priorities for the Budget on May 24th.

Follow my speaking live right now at #Nevers: http://t.co/j9zdmulx # FH2012
I had many reasons to come here at #Nevers today! # 1May # FH2012
Nièvre, land of victory for the left, which welcomes me once again! #Nevers
I was in the Nièvre on May 10, 2011, 30 years after the victory of François Mitterrand. I told you "rendez-vous in 2012"! #Nevers
I come here to pay homage to the great figure that was Pierre Bérégovoy. #Nevers
I want to pay tribute to all the trade unionists in France! #May #Nevers
Labor Day is the feast of unionism! #May #Nevers
I can not accept that there is here, in France, a battle of May 1st against unionism! #May #Nevers
It is as a statesman that I also want to greet Pierre Bérégovoy. #May #Nevers
Pierre Bérégovoy fought against inflation and modernized our country! #May #Nevers
When one was a laborer, when one was a trade unionist, one knows that inflation is a bad thing that eats up. #May #Nevers
Tomorrow .. Freedom and Justice receives John Kerry and Anne Patterson at the party headquarters receives Dr. Mohamed Morsi Chairman of the Freedom and Justice Party ... http://t.co/yfnBOyE0
Be proud, Nivernais, of having known Pierre Bérégovoy! #May #Nevers
May 1st is the feast of all the workers of the world! #May #Nevers
On Labor Day I want to greet with great affection the Chilean women and men who work every day to raise their families.
The sense of humanity that we give to this holiday must not be misguided! #May #Nevers
On this day, I want to make a special call to employers, to respect the dignity and rights of workers and to comply with the law.
Now the outgoing candidate discovers May 1st! This year he has been invited. #May #Nevers
Now the incumbent calls a party of "real" work! #May #Nevers
The other day the incumbent was at the Concorde. This time, he is at odds! #May #Nevers
I will not accept that the outgoing candidate arrogates the work value! Who defends the value of work and who damages it? #May #Nevers
We are all aware that the value of work must be defended, promoted, considered. #May #Nevers
We have to give more room for growth, and in France, and in Europe! #May #Nevers
watched | Reception of Dr. Mohamed Morsi Batanta http://t.co/pq8aYohp
The incumbent chose to condemn us to austerity. I denounce this orientation! # 1May #Europe #Nevers
Why agitate once again the specter of the invasion? #Nevers
The outgoing candidate thinks that the unemployed want to remain unemployed? What the unemployed are waiting for is work! #May #Nevers
What I do not accept is that there has been a wealth tax relief of more than $ 2 billion! #May #Nevers
It will change, and it will be called justice! #May #Nevers
My first priority will be employment. We will create the generation contract: http://t.co/doCx8a0O # 1May #Nevers
Alexander Dale Oen was a big athlete for a small country. My thoughts go to his family and friends.
I am the candidate of all the left gathered! #May #Nevers
And I am the candidate who must expand further so that all those who want change are found in my application! #Nevers
I will never yield to principles, values, and the Republic. #May #Nevers
The country is tired of what has been done for 5 years. #May #Nevers
We will always have beautiful birthdays in May! #May #Nevers
I wish so much that the young generations can live on May 1st, then May 6th, victory of the left, of the change! #May #Nevers
And we will never forget May 10! #May #Nevers
@NtamfuraJustin1. Niba ukizi icyo gukora-gikore..ntampamvu yamagambo menshi,cyangwa ibitarukuri!!
I say to you: be proud to be citizens of the Republic. Do your duty, serve the Republic, serve the change! #May #Nevers
Rwandans uphold the value of WORK because it goes hand in hand with dignifying ourselves and development of our country.Happy#Labour Day!

I wanted May 1st to be the feast of all workers! # 1May # France3
I wanted to pay tribute to Pierre Bérégovoy who was a trade unionist and served his country. # 1May # France3

I do not seduce, outbid, flattery with regard to this or that electorate. # France3
The challenge is simple: do the French want to continue with the incumbent? or do they want change? # France3
I will not convince N. Sarkozy, my duty is to convince the French! # Debate # France3
I will not go back to a kind of funfair tomorrow! I have to go to another level. # Debate # France3
The end of the campaign is based on fear by the incumbent. # France3
I want to tell you my message: a message of reconciliation and gathering. # France3
I hope that the next head of state will have modesty for him and pretension for his country. # France3
